rows:
```
[Header]

"Driver's run @"    ${ThisDriverUserName}
": start at **"  ${ThisDriverFirstRestaurant} " " ${FirstRestaurantEmoji}
" "  ${ThisDriverFirstRestaurantStartTime}  ".** "

IF ${IsFirstRestaurantClosingBefore545PM} THEN
{
  "This restaurant closes at " 
  ${ThisDriverFirstRestaurantClosingTime}  "."
}

"\n" "**Please reply to this thread when you begin your run!**\n\n

Any issue: call today's on-call ops manager,"
" @"${OnCallOpsManager.UserName}", at "${OnCallOpsManager.CompactPhone}".\n\n"


```

```
[Condo]

IF ${ThisDriverAnyCondo} THEN
{
    ":warning:You have a condo on your run: **from the previous delivery "
    "location, call condo consumer** and ask to meet downstairs. "
    "Always leave a message, & **post** if delivery fails "
     "(full instructions at the end).\n\n"
}
```

[PickupHeader]
"Please go to each restaurant and customer in the order listed in the itinerary table. Some restaurants may have no orders to pick up but you still need to stop there to take pics of tomorrowâ€™s order form, and ask about possible orders for today (just in case).\n"

[CompleteCondo]

{
    ":warning: **Complete condo instructions** "
    "(read carefully by clicking the down arrow):\n\n"

    "https://go.helpberkeley.org/t/condo-instructions/3109 \n\n"
}

"Thanks so much for taking the run, and good luck!"
